T02D1405:40b-4: dang gtor ma la sogs pa byas shing bzlas brjod
T02D1405:40b-5: byas na mtshan mo was khyer bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1405:40b-7: bil ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga
T02D1405:40b-8: ma bzhin du rgyas pa'i cho ga bya bar shes
T02D1405:40b-9: par bya'o // go ma sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1405:40b-10: go ma yu zhes bya ba ni wa'i sha'i sbyin
T02D1405:40b-11: sreg yang dang yang du smos pa ni sbyin sreg
T02D1405:40b-12: 'di nyid lhag par 'bras bu che bar bstan to
T02D1405:40b-13: // brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang //
T02D1405:40b-14: bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1405:40b-16: phyi'i brtul zhugs la spyod pa'ang med la /
T02D1405:40b-17: phyi'i gtsang sbra med du zin kyang tshul 'di bzhin
T02D1405:40b-18: du spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa lha rnams kyis bstan
T02D1405:40b-19: pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs so
T02D1405:40b-20: // lhag pa'i tsher 'gyur ba ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1405:40b-21: kusmandam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kusmandam zhes bya ba bum sha'i sa bon dang /
T02D1405:40b-22: mukta ste mon sran gre'u dang /
T02D1405:40b-24: spra tshil te sbrang rtsi'i tshogs ma dang /
T02D1405:40b-26: ma la ta'i lo ma cha mnyam par byas te sngags kyis bskul la /
T02D1405:40b-27: de'i khang pa'i phyogs gcig tu byugs na ji skad bshad pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1405:40b-28: skal ldan bdag gis 'di ru yang //
T02D1405:40b-30: rgyud don rgya mtsho rgal ba yi //
T02D1405:40b-31: mkhas rnams bzod pa mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D1405:40b-33: bsod nams cung zad gang bsams pa //
T02D1405:40b-34: des ni dpa' bo'i snying la ni //
T02D1405:40b-35: dpa' bo la dga' 'di spyod shog /'byor ba'i bran gyi tsha bor gyur //
T02D1405:40b-36: dge ba'i bran las skyes pa'i bu //
T02D1405:40b-37: skal ldan grags pas 'dir brtags pa //
T02D1405:40b-38: ston ka'i zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra byas //
T02D1405:40b-39: klu sgrub kyis ni chos rnams rnam phye sbyar //
T02D1405:40b-40: snyan dngags gtso bo dpa' bo las su yod //
T02D1405:40b-41: tsanda go mi sgra rjes ston zhes grags //
T02D1405:40b-42: sngags tshul 'di la skal ldan bdag rnam mdzes //
T02D1405:41a-1: pa'i dka' 'grel dpa' bo'i yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1405:41a-2: slob dpon chen po skal ldan grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1405:41a-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
T02D1405:41a-5: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
